metadata.title: CVE-2024-35933 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: btintel: Fix null ptr deref in btintel_read_version Ifhci_cmd_sync_complete() is triggered and skb is NULL, then hdev->req_skb isNULL, which will cause this issue.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
